references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of electroencephalography (EEG), the core technology underlying the research presented in the main paper.

references.paper_title: A brain-computer interface that evokes tactile sensations improves robotic arm control
references.reason: This paper highlights a significant advancement in brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), demonstrating a practical application relevant to the main paper's focus on EEG signal processing for BCIs.

references.paper_title: Bert: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces the BERT model, a foundational transformer-based architecture that the main paper adapts and extends for EEG signal processing.

references.paper_title: Meta-learning in neural networks: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of meta-learning techniques, which are relevant to the self-supervised learning approach employed in the main paper.
This paper describes PhysioNet, a crucial database of physiological signals, including EEG data, that the main paper uses for training its model.
